amendment.description: To modify the GAO study of geographic differences in payments for physicians' services relating to the work geographic practice cost index.

vote.text: Amendment SA 996 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 996 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S8681, S8684; text: CR S8684) To modify the GAO study of geographic differences in payments for physicians' services relating to the work geographic practice cost index.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 996 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 996 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
